Class Sha512WithRsaVerifier

Default verifier for Online EFTPOS notifications, using SHA512withRSA signature verification.

Inheritance
System.Object
NotificationVerifierBase

Syntax
public sealed class Sha512WithRsaVerifier : NotificationVerifierBase, INotificationVerifier, IDisposable
Remarks

This class is not available in WinRT/UWP projects.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Sha512WithRsaVerifier(String)

Constructs a new instance using a public key encoded as as base 64 string.

Declaration
public Sha512WithRsaVerifier(string base64PublicKey)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String base64PublicKey

A string containing the base 64 encoded public key to use for verification.
Remarks

If the string provided is in the common format using a header an footer to mark the key extent, these headers are removed before the key is parsed, i.e; -----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY----- xxx -----END PUBLIC KEY----- will have the begin/end public key lines removed.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

Thrown if base64PublicKey is null.
System.ArgumentException

Thrown if base64PublicKey is empty or not a valid base 64 string.
